t: Candy and Candymakers - Encyclopedia of Greater Philadelphia
s: January 20, 2024 - Isaac Rosskam (1839-1904) founded Quaker City & Confectionery Company at Germantown and Susquehanna Avenues in North Philadelphia in 1893 and that same year introduced Good & Plenty, a licorice candy in small hard-shell pieces that is considered the oldest branded candy in the United States.
